title: Broken Sword 5 The Serpent Curse (Episode 1 And 2 /GOG/ Mac)
description:
Hey guys, here broken sword 5 ep 1 and 2 for mac OSX. This is the gog version of the game. It includes the latest version of EP 1 which contains the 1.03 patch and EP2. It includes all the bonus content which I will list below and I hope you guys enjoy. Also please help seed.

Broken Sword 5 Episode 1 (1.03 Patch Notes)

- Full HD / 1080p support 

- Support for different aspect ratios (4:3, 16:10, etc) 

- Russian localisation 

- Several compatibility, crash and game progression bug fixes 

(Just to give you guys a sense of scale as far as the changes go: the previous Mac version weighed in at 2.5 GB and now it weighs in at 4.5 GB ...) 

Thanks and have a nice day :)
